about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Heraldo Domingues — a solutions engineer who thrives at the intersection of people, process, and technology.
about.description: I specialize in simplifying complex problems and creating forward momentum. My focus is helping teams move faster, decide smarter, and build confidently. I'm at my best when supporting technical sales conversations, designing proofs of concept, and guiding buyers through the full customer journey.

strengths.title: I bring:
items: Strategic clarity – I quickly assess what's working, what's not, and where to go next.
Drive to win – I don't just aim for progress. I aim for results that matter.
Vision for the future – I connect today's decisions to tomorrow's opportunities.
Action over analysis – I get teams moving when others are stuck.
Confidence under pressure – I lead conversations with presence, clarity, and care.

about.experience: I've supported sales and customer success across software development, Agile/Scrum, cybersecurity (PAM), networking, and now Generative AI and prompt engineering. My time at Pluralsight sharpened how I demo, design, and deliver solutions that help engineering and L&D leaders move the needle — fast.

engagement.title: You'll find me most engaged when I'm:
items: Mapping a path where none seems clear
